meanings.definition: The act of arranging or styling hair.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys experimenting with different hairstylings for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The hairstylings at the fashion show were elegant and creative.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at hairstylings for the school play made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her hairstylings were like a work of art, each strand perfectly placed.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylings in the magazine were so intricate, she couldn't wait to try them out.

meanings.definition: Different ways in which hair can be styled or arranged.
meanings.sent1: The hairstylings in the salon ranged from classic to modern looks.
meanings.sent2: She admired the hairstylings of the celebrities on the red carpet.
meanings.sent3: His unconventional hairstylings always turned heads wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: The hairstylings she saw in the movie were so unique, she wanted to recreate them.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylings in the beauty magazine inspired her to try something new with her hair.
